title: e-commerce
description: E-commerce project for "Jovenes a Programar" course. Implementation of standard features such as login, user profile modification, product listing and sorting, category management, shopping cart functionality and purchase process.

title: Modelos-Estadisticos-para-Regresion-y-Clasificacion
description: Analysis of various datasets using algorithms such as PCA, EM, Regression Models, Decision Trees, KMeans, LDA, etc.
